content: PRIORITY 1: Connect Dashboard to live backend data (all widgets)
PRIORITY 3: Migrate PostgreSQL/Redis to MongoDB collections (stability)
PRIORITY 4: Add 3 more letter templates (cease/desist, credit dispute, settlement)
PRIORITY 5: Security hardening (rate limiting, headers, JWT, SAST scan)
Add Redis caching layer for CFP, Writer, Legal lookups
Implement job queue with workers for async operations
Add remaining 39 states to SOL table
Normalize all agent JSON to snake_case
Add unified response wrapper for all endpoints
